properties.body:
TYRRHENIAN SEA.
LIGURIAN SEA.
DNC 08.
1. POSSIBLE MAN OVERBOARD FROM M/V MSC OPERA
   BETWEEN CIVITAVECCHIA (42-06-00N 011-48-00E)
   AND GENOVA (44-24-40N 008-55-58E). LAST KNOWN
   POSITION 42-32-00N 010-18-00E AT 082223Z NOV.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
   SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
   PHONE: 39 06 592 4145, 39 065 908 4409,
   FAX: 39 06 592 2737, 39 065 908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2745/15.
